sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO nboard(title, pass, name, content, rdate) VALUES(#title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over ( ORDER BY unq DESC) AS rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq, title, name, content, hits, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS rdate FROM nboard ORDER BY unq DESC) AS a ) AS b WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM nboard
